description: Persona 5 Royal is the definitive edition of the hit game in Atlus's Persona game series.

v0.1.0.description:
**How to play**
Install P5R in Steam and make sure you have the newest version.
Install Reloaded II, then add P5R to it. Then you should just be able to drag the 7z file here to Reloaded to install it.
Generate an ap world.
Configure the mod in Reloaded II to give it the server information. Set the Save Directory to somewhere you don't mind a bunch of files being writen to (doesn't have to be p5r's save directory but it can be). Debug logs are on by default for now, but you can turn them off if you want.
To being your playthrough, load a game from after the tutorial parts. I strongly recommend this save file below. Starting New Game with the mod is broken right now.
https://gamebanana.com/mods/502156
v0.1.0.title: v0.1.0 - Initial Launch

v0.1.1.description: Minor improvement - just added a single missing location name.
v0.1.1.title: v0.1.1 - Added missing location name

v0.1.1r2.description:
### How to play
Install P5R in Steam and make sure you have the newest version.
Install Reloaded II, then add P5R to it. Then you should just be able to drag the 7z file here to Reloaded to install it.
Generate an ap world.
Configure the mod in Reloaded II to give it the server information. Set the Save Directory to somewhere you don't mind a bunch of files being writen to (doesn't have to be p5r's save directory but it can be). Debug logs are on by default for now, but you can turn them off if you want.
To being your playthrough, load a game from after the tutorial parts. I strongly recommend this save file below. Starting New Game with the mod is broken right now.
https://gamebanana.com/mods/502156
v0.1.1r2.title: v0.1.1

v0.1.2.description: Fixed logic that missed an early required grappling hook use.
v0.1.2.title: Fixed logic

v0.1.2r2.description:
Some small improvements and fixes:

- Fix issue where the grappling hook tutorial was incorrectly enabling the use of the grappling hook
- Added some clarity and resilience around incorrectly set save directory
- Removed incorrect notifications for automatic confidants (now only Ryujii, Takemi and Sojiro should notify the items being sent)
- (AP world) Added the text for a location that wasn't set properly
v0.1.2r2.title: v0.1.2 - Early release fixes

v0.1.3.description: The game can no longer take your will seeds away from you. They are yours forever.
v0.1.3.title: v0.1.3 - Hotfix for will seed bug
